text: Va [ej pajomʙar] az onon dar ʙorai [sokinoni] sahre, ki nazdiki darjo ʙud, ʙipurs, hangome ki onon az [hukmi tahrimi sajd dar ruzi] sanʙe tacovuz mekardand, on goh ki mohihoi eson dar ruzhoi sanʙe [ki ruzi ta'tilu iʙodat ʙud] ruji oʙ zohir mesudand va ruzhoi ƣajri sanʙe ʙar eson [hec sajde ruji oʙ] nameomad. Ononro ʙa [xotiri] on ki nofarmoni mekardand, incunin ozmudem
